name: When They Get Drunk
description:
Basic gameplay:
Move your “Brain” by pressing the left and right keys, the down key sucks up MindBlocks, and you can eliminate MindBlocks by pressing the up key to drink.
When eliminating MindBlocks, consecutive identical MindBlocks will earn bonus points (the more consecutive, the more bonus points). Each drink will raise the Drunk Point by X points, X being the number of different types of MindBlocks eliminated.
When DrunkPoint > 10 you will move on to the next stage of drunkenness.

Goals:
To score 100 points or more, which means that the character will have a relaxing and trouble-free sleep for the day.

Tips:
As MindBlock only has 3 colours, blocks of the same colour are not necessarily the same block.
It is recommended to slow down the game to appreciate the sound. There is no need to rush, time does not cause a penalty.
As you get drunker, the character becomes more relaxed and the difficulty decreases accordingly, so when things get tough, just drink!
Just drink!
